column1: Bunny Rabbit. A rabbit walked up to me. I was very scared and tried to walk it away. I was really scared when the bunny finally moved. I tried to move but the bunny was too fast. I finally got out of my way and was able to get the bunny out of my way.
Good Terms. Fred received a huge tip from a friend that he had a discount. He went to the store to get it. The man took out a bunch of coupons. He got it at the store the next day. Fred was ecstatic.

What And Itch. The girl climbed the ladder and went to her mom's house. Her mom was there. She climbed the ladder and then the mom got ready to leave. She ran back upstairs, but was not back to her mom's house. She ran into the kitchen when she realized she had left the lid on.
Empty Club. Tim wanted to go to a club. He checked his pockets for his wallet. He didn't find a good deal. He went to the club anyway. He met a pretty girl there.

Wrestling. I was very happy when I met my boyfriend. We played video games for a few days before the date. We went to the theater to watch the movie. I met my girlfriend and we went inside. We had a good time.

Magical Fruit. He was happy because he was finally eating some real fruit. The fruit was delicious. He ate the fruits as soon as he could. His friends all laughed and cheered him on. They wanted to eat more fruits.
Schedule. My dad was supposed to wake me up in two minutes. It was a difficult task. But it turned out to be worth it. He made my bed and then he finished work.
Candy in the dirt. Mary loved candy. She was always looking for some. One day, she found a giant cookie on the ground. She picked it up and put it on the counter. When she sat down, she ate it.

Robins cruel exit. Jake and his girlfriend were on vacation. She had gone to Mexico with their grandparents. Jake was very sick and had to get surgery. Jake had to go back home. They were still there for a week.

Good Fences. I went to the garden store and bought a bunch of grass for hedges. The hedges were made of wood and clover. I filled them in a bucket, put some on the hedges, and waited. I watched the hedges until they rained. I put them all on my fence and had a nice fall.

Carnival Games. We decided to have a carnival game. It was fun but there was so much you needed to do. We got our supplies together. We packed a lot of games. We got to the party and had a great time.

New Neighbors. Tim and his neighbors didn't want their new apartment to be over-sized. They tried everything they could to save it up. They went to a lot of events and bought everything they could. Now, Tim and his neighbors have a large place in town.

The Face Wash. Sam wanted a new face. She went to the beauty salon and looked around. She didn't find a good looking one. Sam went home and looked at a lot of the other hair products. She chose a pretty red one.
Bill started a company. He was really good at marketing. He made a ton of money. He went to college. He got a new job as a marketing consultant.

Pool. Kate's school offered her some free school play tickets. She paid for them, and she was able to get one. She did not like the idea that it would be expensive. But then her parents were able to reimburse her. Kate was so happy she left them money!
Megan sees a ghost. She sees the ghost. She screams because she has forgotten to put in her shoes. She runs after the ghost. She wakes up, finds her shoes are missing.

Francine Has her Ears Pierced. Marie had been wearing braces for 10 years. She was having her ears pierced. Marie decided to go to the piercing parlor. Marie decided to buy a ring. Marie had her ears pierced again.
Penn. Alex wanted to go swimming. He went to the lake. He dove for his first jump. Alex made it to the diving board and felt exhilarated!

Flower Shop. I had a friend on the bench who went with me once. I took her and we went to our room together. We talked about my trip together and got into the bathroom. The bathroom was full of flowers. It had been such a great trip!
Shoes. Tom was walking to school. He found a pair of boots. He put them on. He put them on. It felt great.

Spare Change. Tom was in a relationship. They ended up being married a few years later. Tom was given a haircut and got married with his new haircut. Tom was angry that he didn't get to cut it. Tom went back to the bar to ask for help.

Balloon Fight. Jason got a new balloon. The balloon was too loud to blow on his head. Jason got a new pair of flip flops. They were too loud to blow on the ground. Jason went to the local dance studio and tried to blow on his new balloon. Jason laughed at the noise and pretended not to care.
Stripley. He had a crush on her. She never told him about it. His sister came over and asked why. He denied it. She didn't want to tell him. He lied to her and did that for him.

Milkshake. Yesterday I made a strawberry cake for myself. I put the sugar and chocolate in the batter. Then I added the flour and baking powder. It was just what I had ordered. I decided to make it every morning now.
Vintage toy. I bought a toy that was an old toy. It was a red dinosaur figurine. I decided to buy it. I put it in a box in my house. It took me a while to get it.

New Underwear. We had a few pairs of Underwear for a party. We wore them to work and everyone loved them. We all wore them to dinner and later, we went out to eat. We were very glad to have them for dinner.

The Psychology of Grades. I wanted to know why I got the lowest grade in class. I asked all the teachers and they were all very nice. I told them that it is because my grade was too low. They all told me that this is because I have a history of being bad at math. I decided to quit the class because of my grade.

New Dog. Fred always loved dogs. His favorite was a German Shepherd named Wicker. One day he was walking around in his backyard. Fred saw Wicker laying on the lawn. Fred saw Wicker pecking at his leg. Fred cried when he realized he had peed.

Music Band. Tom loved to play guitar. He decided to try out for the school band. They tried a few of his songs but they sounded bad. Tom's band got sick and Tom never got on with it. He wound up quitting school for a month.

The Concert. The Smiths went to a concert in Brighton. They had been rehearsing all week. They decided to do a song at the end of the week. They were extremely happy. When the singer came in, she was ecstatic.

Dinosaurs. Tom always loved dinosaurs. Tom decided to make a lizard for his dog. It wasn't until he was out of work that Tom could afford one. Tom was very proud of it and kept it for his dog. After many years, the dog finally gave up on it and gave it up for adoption.
Pickles. Gina decided to make grilled cheese. She put it in the refrigerator. When she took it out she made it. Gina enjoyed it!
Raking Leaves. Amy decided to put in the tree. She gathered all the branches. Amy cut the leaves. She set the branches in the sun. Amy got to work and finished her job.

Dangerous Campfire. Allie wanted to cook a campfire. Her mom told her to get her own charcoal. She bought a pack of the best stuff she could find. Allie cooked the fire for hours. She got the grill to cook it perfectly.

Bianca Dyes Her Hair. Bianca was looking forward to a nice blonde summer day at the beach. When she got to the beach, she quickly realized she couldn't get her hair in. Bianca had to pick out different color options. Finally she picked out a bright green color. Bianca was happy to have her hair in the shade.
Dancing. She wanted to become a dancer. She practiced dancing all week. She put on her best ballet outfit. She went to the school dance. She was a good dancer.

Buying a New TV. I went to the hardware store today to buy a new TV. I tried the new ones out at the electronics store. They had a lot of features on them. I ended up buying two of them. My new TV was great.
Deaf Kid. Dan wanted to lose weight. He went to the gym and got his workout plan. Dan didn't realize he had anorexia. Dan started to gain a lot of weight. Dan eventually lost half of his body weight.
Race. I took a long driving trip to see Santa. The traffic was terrible. I ended up leaving. But I finally found Santa at the end of the road.

The Puppet Show. I wanted to try out for a puppet show. I found out that I would be getting a job that required me to do some housework. I decided to apply to the local puppet show. I went into the audition and was chosen. I got to work and I did the show and made the show.

New Hobby. Ken wanted to get his son a motorcycle. He found a cool looking bike. It looked like it would give him a motorcycle. Ken bought it. He rode it everyday with it. He liked it more than anything.

No Jumping. Tim loved to surf. He loved to surf at the beach and often. One day he noticed someone on his surfboard. He got on board and it started to go really fast. He was very scared and never jumped at the beach again.

Comparison. When it was our turn to play my favorite video games the game was out. I was playing the game online for hours and hours. My roommate told me I couldn't play until 4am. We finally made it to the game's ending. I felt very lucky and happy.

seafood. My favorite meal of the day was my family's oatmeal. I got it from the store and put in my pantry. When I went to put it in, the bag fell. It got stuck in the bag while I was making the oatmeal. I threw it away and never tasted it again.
Burritos. I made pasta for a family gathering. My daughter made tortillas. I used leftover pasta. I used a scoop and then started to eat. I was very hungry and had no time to eat.
Spinach. The family went to the local grocery store. They purchased a spinach pack. They all ate the spinach. They ate some chips and chips. The kids loved the spinach pack.

Exercising. We wanted to get ready for work that afternoon. I had to eat a lot of junk food in the morning. My boyfriend didn't like the thought of eating junk food. We tried different ways to fit into the diet. After a week of working out, I was much more fit.

New Year's Resolution. My wife was very upset with the last year of her old marriage. Last year my wife took a drastic action. She took a year off of work. She went to a therapist for help. She has become very confident and motivated this year.

John Buys An Umbrella. I was walking through the woods last week with my girlfriend. We decided to check out the new umbrella store. We found an old one in the store that had fallen off. When we got inside we got our first umbrella. It was a really nice umbrella.

Embarrassing Mistake. Amy was at a concert with her friend at an empty bar. Her friend was having a great time. The band members were having a party. Amy made an excuse for leaving the bar. When she went back home, she noticed the door was locked.

Greenery. The family had a favorite part of Florida. They lived on the beach all summer. They planted a dozen acres of lush trees. Soon they were able to grow tons of healthy trees. They had a wonderful time at their new beach.

The Weight Loss Expert. Gina had never been in a weight loss program before. The program required participants to eat an entire day of fast food. Gina decided to stop the program in order to lose weight. The training didn't work as Gina was scared. She realized that she was fat.
Library Book. I decided to pick out a novel. I searched online for some great ones. I found one that I liked. It was a good read. I recommend it to anyone looking for a good novel.

Low Blood Sugar. Jim was lactose intolerant. So he made some blood sugar meds. And he took some and drank it a bit. And he did a few more drinks before he got sick. But his blood sugar was way too high.
Broken Nose. Tom was using the bathroom. The bathroom was not working. It was covered in glue. Tom threw it in the trash. He tried it again in no time.

Eternal love. Bill's girlfriend was getting married. Bill's girlfriend knew his ex-girlfriend liked his wedding. Bill was married to a beautiful woman. He made a special wish for her. She died a few days after he met her.
Lost Phone. Tom was at home. Someone called to say a friend needed a call. Tom didn't know where it was. He checked his phone and it was at a number. Tom called back and it was gone.
Eviction. Kim was in a bad mood. She left the bar early. The next day she got caught in a traffic jam. She decided to stay home. She called a cab. The cab took her to court.

Thunder. Bob and his friend John were at the pool one night. John didn't see Bob because he is a bit small. Bob saw John so Bob grabbed a towel and washed him. John got to go play at the pool with Bob, and Bob was happy.
Lost poncho. Sam was playing basketball with his friends. He was trying to do a dunk. He hit the hoop with three seconds left. It looked like his hand slipped off. Sam caught it and took it back.

Swim. Sally loved swimming. She bought a cool water bladder to keep it in her car. Sally took her son to the store to get a new one. Sally spent her afternoon on the swim floor. She was glad she bought a new swim bladder.

Sticky. I was going to my favorite band. I got up to go to their shows. I noticed that the band had a sticky spot on my tongue. It went from being a painful pain to being unbearable. I didn't know what to do. I walked back to the band and was able to sit on the stage.

Mother. I went to bed at 3:30 in the morning. I woke up to my dog crying. I decided to take him to the vet and the doctor told me. I was glad when he was able to come back from the vet. I then decided I would not take him to the doctor.
ID. Sam was getting ready for school. He was in an hour late. He was going to get in trouble. But he kept on going to school. The next day, he got detention again.

The Inheritance. Sam had a big, expensive mansion that he owned. He was able to keep it all the way back when he was 80 years old. But he also decided that he wouldn't sell his mansion. He asked all his friends and family to come by to help. Sam's estate was in the hands of his grandchildren.

Mike Drinks White Wine. Jerry's friend Tom was retiring. He wanted to celebrate him. He invited Jerry to his friend's party. Jerry and his friend drank wine for a few minutes. Jerry was glad he remembered to bring his friend a glass.

Broken Bike. Gina's bike was starting to wobble. She tried to fix it, but it wouldn't budge. But the chain was slipping, and she tried to fix it. The chain snapped and her bike wouldn't turn! The owner had to call a tow truck to fix it!

The Blind Date. Tim was in college studying and was ready to get married. But the night before his wedding he was on the blind date. Tim didn't plan to be careful though. And Tim was so nervous that he ended up getting a rejection.

The Stormy Day. A car plowed through a neighborhood with the school bus. There were many cars in the neighborhood. Many homes were destroyed or damaged. Several homes were rebuilt or rebuilt. A lot of damage was done by the bus driver.

White Cast Christmas. Tom was having an extra late birthday. He wanted to surprise his friend. He got a special treat for his new friend. He decorated a table for Tom's friend's birthday. He showed his friend the table for his friend's birthday.
The volleyball accident. Tim was playing on a volleyball court. The ball had bounced off and hit a girl. Tim ran to the ball to fix it. His ball wasn't damaged. Tim was happy he'd been careful.
Turtle Fears. Tom saw an amazing turtle on the beach. It was very small and tiny. Tom picked it up and fed it. The turtle got very anxious. Tom got a lot of pills from it.

Shoelaces. Fred hated the look on his face. One day, Fred noticed the same kind of shoelaces were missing. He ran outside to check. When he went to the store, he found the same ones. Fred was proud of his unique looks.

Easy mac disappointment. All my friends have macs but I can't make them. My friends try but no. Then they start to talk about how bad the macs are. They are so bad that I never got one. I just can't afford to buy them.
Puppy Litter. I bought a very expensive puppy for her birthday. The dog was filthy and dirty. I threw it into the garbage. I noticed a big pile of poop inside. I realized I had to throw it away.

Old Friend. My best friend's daughter was 12 and had three boys. She told him that the boys weren't a match for her. He didn't listen and tried to hit her with the bat. She was very upset with him. He threatened to tell his parents and he didn't listen.
The Easter Parade. Last year we went on a carnival. Our friends were all over. My mom told them not to drive off. Our cousins all pulled into the driveway. We got on the car and headed off.

No Littering. Tom was trying to get in shape. It was his first time doing it. Tom was excited and was very happy. Unfortunately he found that he wasn't the best at lifting. Tom decided to go to an indoor gym instead.

Ham Sandwich. I had a box of peanut butter and jelly sandwiches. I took one out of the freezer and put it in my microwave. My sister was very impressed. She said it was the best sandwich she ever had. I told her to stop eating it because it tasted so good.

Confession. Gina was at a party. And she felt uneasy that she could not keep her friends company. But when they arrived at the house, they started to make her feel good. Gina decided that her boyfriend needed to be more careful about how he treats people. So he started putting on a show.
Janet. Janet wanted to go to the opera. So she saved her money for three weeks. She bought tickets online and was there for an hour. When she got there, she was able to find a seat. Janet was happy.

The fishing trip. I went fishing with my family on our weekend trip. I put on my biggest fishing pole. My pole was really big. I grabbed the biggest fish I had ever seen. My friends laughed when I caught it.

Rex Drinks Tea. Mary was walking home from school one night. Her car was stopped when a car pulled into the parking lot. Her friend came over to see what she was drinking. She had a tea with her tea and drank it! Mary had a great time and was glad she was home.

Scared Teddy. Lucy was about to go to the dentist for her wisdom teeth. She was so excited to try them, but she quickly dropped them. It turns out they were rotten! She ended up with an infection. She was very scared and vowed not to go to the dentist again.
Power Outage. The battery in the room was running low. The air conditioner in my room did not work. It blew the battery out and I had to buy an air conditioner. I bought a new one online.
A new hobby. Jake loved reading and playing video games. He decided to start taking lessons. Now he plays video games all the time. Jake is happy with his new hobby.
Photo. Tom was in college. His dorm was getting a new school. He couldn't afford to get a second opinion. Tom was devastated. He had to change schools.

The Deadline. The final question on the report was submitted to the teacher. The teacher gave the class a five page report. The report was about what students can learn from the test. A student asked for a quiz and the teacher said no. The student went to the library and got an answer.

Wine tasting. Today I got wine tasting for my school's annual class. I bought some wine. I drank the whole bottle. When I went to take the bottle home I took a small sip. I was disappointed I didn't have the hang of the wine.
The bed. Yesterday I bought a new bed. I bought a new mattress and I was very excited to sleep. I set up my new bed. I slept so well I got a call from my roommate.
The saxophone. The boy was a really good saxophonist. He bought a saxophone from the store. He put on his saxophone and went to sleep. The next morning he woke up. His saxophone was missing!
The Farm. The children were on a field trip. They loved playing. They found some nice ducks in the water. They bought a big net. The ducks had many friends.

Outside the Window. She walked away with a lot of trouble. She was afraid her mother would find out. She went into her room and turned on the light. She stepped back and her mother didn't find her. She was so upset she walked out and went home.

Making it gluten free. When I was young I had never had gluten in my diet. After a few years of trying it I was really intrigued by gluten. When I went gluten free I tried it again. It didn't taste as good as before. It took me a while and I ended up with a weird rash.

The plane trip. I went on the plane for the first time in two weeks. I sat down to get ready and began the flight. Once I got on, my stomach started to hurt. The plane landed in a field. There, the plane landed safely.

Jen's Game. Tony bought a brand new gaming system and started working on it. He had to make a lot of mistakes. Tony was trying to pass out flyers for his friends. Someone yelled at Tony. Tony felt awful.

More Alone. Jake was excited to be with his best friend on a Saturday afternoon. The girls got into a fight over the phone. Jake got home early and left the house in the morning. Jake and his friends were so lonely after the fight! They left on the next Friday.
Theme park excitement. I took a trip to the park today. It was amazing. I was mesmerized by the park. I saw so many great rides. My eyes and hands were full of energy.

Futsal. The kids were trying out for their school's soccer team. After a week of practice, they were ready to play. They worked hard the rest of the week. The day of the tryout, they played very well! The kids had an amazing day!
Bluebirds. A couple walked along a park bench. One bird swooped in and snatched it from the bushes. The other bird walked away. The couple took it home. The couple got to watch them eat it.
The Trip. Jill was going on a vacation. She wanted to travel the world. Jill and her friends had a trip together. Jill bought a ticket and brought it with her. Jill went on a trip with her family.

Carnival Ride. One day, a small family decided to go to the carnival. Their best bet was to win a ticket. They decided to go in the circus. They had a great time. They went to the next one before they had to go home.

Lost Throughout the Process. Tom was a great salesman. Tom was having a rough time selling things. He decided to buy some new electronics. He bought all the things he wanted. He sold them for a good price.

The Murderer. Jeff was sentenced to life in prison for a murder he did not commit. The prosecutor said Jeff was a good man who was not evil. The jury found Jeff guilty. Jeff had to go to prison to live the rest of his life.

Home Run. Jack's brother wanted a ride to the park. Jack said he would if he could do it himself. He bought an old basketball and threw it in the park. When Jack started playing basketball, it bounced all over his brother's car. Jack got the broken ball and gave it to his brother.

Greg Visits the Zoo. Sam was an avid dog lover. He found a stray dog wandering in his backyard. Sam decided he would check in on the dog daily. Sam noticed the dog's collar was missing. Sam took the dog home and checked the collar for its collar.

New Shoes. Tim wanted to buy a new pair of shoes. He shopped around but couldn't find anything nice. Then he looked through his closet and found an old pair. Tim was so excited to buy a new pair. He wore them to work that day.
Cole. The man was running around a lot. He was walking his dog. It got muddy. The man got out of his car. The dog was okay.

Shirley Temple Doll. Shirley went to the Shirley Temple on her birthday. She fell in love with the religious shrines. Her parents took her to the local mall. She loved them, and went to her very first shrine. Shirley was very happy when she walked in on her date.

Patty's Sleepover. Every Saturday, Becky and her friends have a sleepover in the park. Everyone is invited to come over. This Saturday there was only one person left in the park. Becky's friends and family all came and picked out a lot of different animals. When it was time to eat, everyone ate.

New Shears. Sara decided to buy new glasses. She ordered one with a green lens. She put it on and went to look at it. She noticed that the lens was blue and sparkly. She went to the store to get more.

As I Sit Here. Amy was sitting at a table at school. She saw her classmate at the table. She asked her friend if she could sit next to her. She found her friend to be cute. Amy sat next to her friend.

Going to School. My mom was going to be late for school. When the teacher showed up, I was so sad. I didn't know what to do with my life. Finally, I decided to go back to school. I'm glad I went back to school.
Hit. Amy really wanted the dog to go for a walk. She bought a new crate. Then, she went and bought the puppy food. The puppy liked it and loved it! Amy couldn't wait to go home.
The dog. John had to rescue a dog for an overnight. He didn't want to spend that much money so he called a friend. They went to the vet. They had the dog trained. They got the dog to be safe.
Fears. Tim was scared of spiders. Tim went to the pet store to buy spiders. Tim found a good looking set. Tim got very scared after a few bites. Tim never found another one.
Driver. I was driving to work. The car on the other side was very slow. I ended up tripping over a large curb. My car swerved and rolled over. I had to call a tow truck to pick up the car.

Man's best friend. Aiden recently broke up with his boyfriend. He wanted to marry another girl but he didn't want to get married. He decided to pick a girl, but he was too young. The girl was a little too sweet and she said no. He finally became his best friend and they married.

The First Birthday. I decided to make my daughter a cake. I baked some eggs and sugar. She looked at the cake and was surprised at how delicious it was. She said it was a nice way to celebrate her first birthday. We went out together and she brought her cake.
The fair. I went to the fair with my friend. The girls were so cute. We played together for ten minutes. When the day came I was so disappointed. I was so disappointed in myself.

The Bison. The Bison had a very high IQ. It was considered very dangerous. The local town offered a pet to the Bison. The Bison was afraid of the wolves, though. They used to watch the dogs while the wolves ran around. One day a wolf ran after the dog and chased after it.

A Good Samaritan. Timmy had recently lost his home and was having trouble getting around. He got a call from a neighbor who asked if he needed help. The neighbor came by to help Timmy. They talked for a while and got in the back of Timmy's truck. They took Timmy to a hospital in a stable.

Pictures. We looked at some photos of the dog. It looked a little different than the one in our house. We started getting a lot of shots. We put them all together. We then put the images on the internet.

Appendicitis. I was watching a movie with my girlfriend last night. The movie was called Serenade. I was very worried that I would be sick. I decided to take medication and I was fine. I am not feeling well until tomorrow.

Money. Tom was in the market for a new home. He knew it wasn't perfect, so he offered to lend it to his friend. The friend agreed. Tom took the job and moved into his new house. Tom didn't lose his job, though!

Genre Disagreement. My friend came over to see me the other day. I told her the name of my favorite band and their record label. She started talking about how much she likes it. I realized I didn't understand what she was talking about. I became mad at my friend.
For a Five. Kimmy was walking home. She stepped on a banana peel and broke her arm. She spent the rest of the day resting at home. Kimmy later decided to go home. Kimmy has never been happier.

Sardines. When I was younger, I had a crush on a girl I knew. One day my friend, named Sadie, came over to visit. My friend wanted to take me to dinner at a restaurant in NYC. Sadie said yes. I asked Sadie to pick me up and she said yes.
Too Curious. Tom was looking through his closet. A few minutes later, he found a nice box. Inside was a beautiful gift card. Tom couldn't believe he had received such a thoughtful gift!

The School Fight. Mary sat at the table with a friend. One day, someone asked Mary to be a girl scout. Mary agreed and had a blast. She felt like a hero when someone punched her in the face. Mary felt lucky, but didn't go out to join a girl scout group.

Video Game. My son and I got into a shooting contest. We were all on my favorite game controller. We all ended up with a lot of points. My son won several trophies. I am going to keep winning even more for my son.

Milkshakes. I went to my friend's house for dinner one night. She was at home playing with her brother. They went out for drinks and she fell asleep. When I woke up later that night she was laying on the couch. I ran to my friend's house to help her but she was late. I decided to order pizza and she got a free pizza.

Bad Haircut. Kya's friend asked her out. Kya was unsure. But when she got to her friend's house she had a great time! Kya decided to go for a long hair cut. She ended up having a beautiful, straight long curly hair.

The New Airplane. Charles dreamed of owning a new airplane. He saved up all his money for his dream. One day Charles took his plane and flew it to his new home. He loved the trip and couldn't wait to fly it again. He sold his dream plane and took flying lessons.

Bruised Knees. It was Christmas morning. I decided to wear my new dress to school. I was so nervous, I forgot the clothes! I ended up falling asleep. When I woke up, my head was aching from the cold. I learned to not wear the same clothes for the rest of the year.

Heavy Belly. Kim and her dog were playing on the playground one day. When her dog bit Kim, she ran to the playground. Her dog saw the bully with her belly and ran away. She went back to the playground and apologized to the bully. The bully never saw her again and left her alone with her belly.

The STained Glass. Sam was walking around the yard one day. A small kid was walking across a dusty street. The kid got a large stinging stinging flash. Sam had to get glasses to look in the dark. Sam was disappointed.

The pregnancy prank. Yesterday I was doing some gardening on the side of the road. My friend told me it would be a great idea to make an amazing flower. I bought some seeds and a box of seeds. I took the seeds out of the box and started to plant. The seeds grew and then the flowers were ready for the baby.

Special Treat. Jane took her kids on a walk along the playground. They got a treat for their birthday. They ordered soda and chips and burgers. The kids ate a nice bowl of ice cream. The kids thanked Jane.
A Ship Without Direction. Tom was stuck in traffic for an hour. Tom felt helpless and asked to stay. Tom's friends encouraged him to stay. After that Tom made a lot of new friends and loved them.

Bad decision. The man decided he didn't have to make the decision to quit smoking. Instead he began to smoke at a very young age. He felt comfortable, and he decided to quit. He tried to quit several times before, but they didn't work. Finally, he made the decision and continued to smoke.

Unicorn. The church was having a field trip. I made my way to the front of the building. I walked in the aisle to ask if I had any money. Everyone was shocked to see the coins. The pastor said that he lost all his coins.

Egypt. In 2006, my sister went to Alaska. She had never been before. My sister told me the plane went to an oil field. She said it was in the middle of nowhere. When she took it off the plane went right over a pond!

Office job. Sally worked at the grocery store. She was hired on Thursday at the end of the week. She was scheduled to take an interview at 8 pm. Sally was very nervous and didn't know what she was going to be doing. Sally was fired for being so shortsighted.

Wrong Number. My wife just turned 50 this week. We wanted to make an effort to get her a wedding present for her birthday. We went to the mall to look for a gift. Finally we found a cute gift card with our name on it. She happily opened it and found a card for her birthday.
Summer. The kids gathered around in the basement. They talked and talked and talked. It was the most fun they had ever had! They had a blast playing basketball together.
Ants in the Keurig. We moved into a big house, and some plants were dying. We went to see the animals that died. We found a deer and killed it. We had a lot of fun.
New Pet Toys. The kids had a new pet. They were getting a new pet. They wanted a new kitten. They all got one. The family played all day. They had a lot of fun!

Baby Girl. It was my first day of summer at a beach with a new pet. When I was out of water, a jellyfish crawled into my lap. I screamed as I screamed and chased after the fish. Finally I caught the fish, and it ate all of my food. Then, the jellyfish started eating my food again!

Ray. She loved playing with her brother. But there was something bothering them. He didn't like to play with her. They all made fun of her. She was too old to play with them anymore. They got very angry with her.

Singer. Anna wanted to learn how to sing. She read about lessons online. Her friend had a great time learning how. They practiced singing for months. Then she sang beautifully! Anna was glad she learned to sing!
Speed Walking. Tim was very overweight. He decided to go for a walk. He saw a homeless man sitting on a bench. Tim felt bad for the homeless man. He stopped walking and walked again.

Snow day. The snow had started to fall, and the weather was bad. Everyone was scared that something was going to happen. We decided to go out in the snow. We all went out together. It was a beautiful day.
Trip to animal kingdom. My uncle took me to the zoo. We had a lot of fun looking at animals. We were able to catch a turtle. We all took a trip to the zoo. The trip was a great way to bond.

She Can't Wait To Stuff It. It's just a matter of when she has a new dog. So she wants to buy a dog that's going to get better. She works a long hours every day to try and get her dog the best. Finally, she finds the perfect dog. After all, she knows there are other dogs that can do so well.

The Long Hike. Bill decided to do a long hike at the local park. Bill got his permit and headed out to the park. Bill set out early and enjoyed himself while hiking. He decided he would do the rest of the hike. Bill left the park after the long hike and got back in the car.
Weight. The man worked in his garage. He was working on building a ladder. He got some extra tools to make it work. He got it ready to go. He put it on and the ladder was ready.

Building a Sand Castle. Jake and his friends went to a castle together. They took a trip to get some water. They set up the castle. They then went to the river to water it. The water was so refreshing!

Missed Bus. Tom took a trip to the bus stop. Unfortunately it was raining very hard. Tom had to buy a raincoat and raincoat. Tom was so frustrated he took a bus home. Tom spent the next day having to wait for another bus.

Not as Real as it Seems. On a Saturday morning in my old town my boyfriend is eating lunch. His food is bad and it gets dark quickly. This Saturday, he is cooking his favorite food. He comes over and he drinks the entire burger. It was terrible and he ended up not getting the drink he wanted.

Brave Ben. I had to ask the principal to fix the ceiling fan. The principal said the fan broke when it hit the wood. When I got back to the classroom the student was furious. My teacher said I was not responsible enough. He ended up throwing me out and taking away my test.

Aging Parent. Tom has been taking a lot of lessons. When he graduated high school, he decided to start his own business. Tom was looking forward to owning his own business. His friend suggested he start a business based on cookies. Tom said that he was very grateful and they are now his business.

Rocks. A lot of the trees in my neighborhood were in bad shape. I went to see what I could do about it. I bought a large oak log to keep the tree in good shape. My daughter came over one day and we took the log to the hardware store. She said to never come near the tree again.
The Fraud. A group of high school students went on a trip. They were going to a small museum. One of the kids asked for money. They refused. They left with no explanation.
Antwan's story. One day he is doing well in the race. He is very well prepared. He doesn't practice often. He has to do one more lap. He is very close to winning.

Simon. He wanted to impress the lady with the extra attention she'd gotten. So, he practiced and thought for a while. After a while, his girlfriend's crush asked him out on a date. He agreed to the date. They fell in love after a few months of dating.
